hanzi-su-wiki:
厳

Значения

Торжественный, величественный; суровый, строгий; внушающий страх

Мнемоника

Искажено. Точки наверху — рты. Криками и дубиной 攵 выгонять медведя из берлоги, что под обрывом 厂.

Варианты

嚴, 严
purpleculture_pinyin:
yán
Japanese variant of 严
Японский вариант Янь
rtega_mnemonic:
嚴嚴RS
严严		厳strict, rigorous, rigid, stern
  • two mouths 口口 speaking strictly to a daring 敢 person on a cliff 厂
  • 嚴 → 厳
儼𠑊
heisig_constituent: stern, owl, cliff, daring, spike, ear, taskmaster
koohiiStory1: This represents a stern looking owl, perched up on a cliff. This cliff is quite famous for daring individuals to cliff dive off of, but is any of them daring enough to threaten the owl?
koohiiStory2: The daring mouse gets a stern look after he climbs onto the owl´s cliff...　RTK2:　ゲン　厳禁　　げんきん　("Strickly Prohibited!")　　　　　　　　　　　ゴン　華厳経　けごんギョウ(Avatamsaka Sutra).
kunYomi: おごそ.か、きび.しい、いか.めしい、いつくし
jp_example_words:
厳か(おごそか): austere, majestic, dignified, stately, awful, impressive
厳密(げんみつ): strict, close
厳重(げんじゅう): strict, severe, firm, strong, secure, rigour
厳しい(きびしい): strict
jp_readingExamples: 厳格 (げんかく), 厳重 (げんじゅう), 威厳 (いげん), 厳か (おごそ.か), 厳しい (きび.しい)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you see a grassy cliff with an elf under it in winter, it's because their parents are so strict. When elf kids misbehave they're supposed to go stand under grassy cliffs to think about what they've done.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Only really, really strict parents would make their kids do that in the middle of winter! It's cold!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: One of the strict parents of this elf kid is... Genji (げん)?! Looks like he had another illegitimate kid... this time with an elf.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Oh Genji, if only you were as strict about using protection as you were on your elf child.
Ru_Radicals: 厂 (скала), 尚 (ещё), 攵 (складной стул), 耳 (ухо)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you're daring (敢) under the small (⺍) cliff (厂) you'll receive severe treatment

yán
яп. вм. 严
Radicals: 厂, 夂,  (cliff, winter, grass, elf)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you see a grassy cliff with an elf under it in winter, it's because their parents are so strict. When elf kids misbehave they're supposed to go stand under grassy cliffs to think about what they've done.
Only really, really strict parents would make their kids do that in the middle of winter! It's cold!
Reading Mnemonic
One of the strict parents of this elf kid is... Genji (げん)?! Looks like he had another illegitimate kid... this time with an elf.
Oh Genji, if only you were as strict about using protection as you were on your elf child.
